item.description:
The Connecticut Science Center's adults only party!

June 10, 6:00 - 10:00 PM (new time!)
Liquid Lounge: Birthday Bash!
Celebrate the BIG 1 with us at our birthday-themed party.

Birthday Surprises * 150+ exhibits * 1,000+ friends
Games * Cirque-style Performers * Live Band * DJs * Karaoke
Mingle with USA Gymnastic Olympians * Dating on Demand (Comcast)
Liquid delights (Liquid Ice) * Good Eats and more! * 21+ only

PS: Last Liquid Lounge until the fall! DONâ€™T MISS IT!

Tickets:
$10 in advance online by June 9: https://tickets.ctsci...
$15 at the door * $10 for Members
Purchase tickets at www.CTScienceCenter.org/liquid
Normal parking rates apply. Garage open until midnight.
item.name: "Liquid Lounge" at the Connecticut Science Center
